name: get_score
description: Get the psychometric results based on the interaction with user.

name.description: get the psychometric tool name exactly just in 'mood', 'ptsd', 'anxiety', 'depression' or 'suicide'.

score.description: get the psychometric score in number

maxScore.description: get the psychometric max score in number

severity.description: get the brief text regarding the Severity score

description.description: get the clear explanation for treatment guiding based on score
